1370: Esa was born in Oly straetje in 1370.

Gave birth to Soeten in 1370 at age 23.
1372: Gave birth to Reynildis in 1372 at age 25.

1380: Gave birth to Hodine in 1380 at age 33.
1381: Lost daughter Marie when Marie was 0 years old.

1383: Gave birth to Ricmoden in 1383 at age 36.
